timeline.bodyText: the page header adds a link margin this is what was causing the changelog issue
timeline.author: timja

timeline.bodyText: I could stick a !important on the alert classes in style.less which would mean these changes aren't needed, but there's a very low risk it could break something, and it would block any customisation of the alerts
timeline.author: timja

replies.bodyText: (most of the css rules in this file are needed to undo the styles set by the page header)
replies.author: timja
